Name: TV segment guest appearance
Description: This is a compound-value type that holds information about people in TV episode segments in non-acting, guest appearances.

Properties.Name: Person
Properties.Description: The person appearing as a guest (that is, in a non-acting role and in a non-official capacity such as an interviewee or musical guest)

Properties.Name: Segment
Properties.Description: The segment of a TV episode that this person appeared in.
